title: My Father Started a Life in Another World - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Transported to Another World
author: 世楽八九郎
description:
Emi Nikokado, a very ordinary female office worker, received an e-mail from her father (60), who had gone missing without her knowledge.

According to his message, he was currently living in another world with an elf.

'No way!' She then double-checked everything, and it was confirmed to be true.

While she did feel concerned at the idea of a beautiful elf and her father cohabitating, Emi worked tirelessly for the sake of her only living family in her present world.

For that reason, Emi then proceeded to read a lot of light novels and sent packages to the other world via Ama**n.

And these are snippets of Emi's struggles and her father's second life in another world.
>
